column2: A follower of Lingayatism, a devotionalist sect of Shavism.
A follower of the Natha school of Shaivism, a non-dual tantric system of Hatha Yoga practitioners.
A follower of Shaiva Siddhanta, believing in salvation through Shiva's grace.
this character has committed to a vegetarian diet.
This character is a member of the Shudra Caste, tending to be laborers
this character is a member of the Dalit, or Untouchables, born without a caste.
As a Mantramarga faithful, it is my duty to choose which path of devotion to Shiva I shall follow.
Lingayatism, as I shall entirely devote myself to Shiva through daily meditating
The path of Natha, focusing my practice on Hatha Yoga and tantrism.
Shaiva Siddhanta, aiming for enlightenment through Shiva's perfection.
